events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
System classified the customer's issue as a refund request based on the message content.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah J. who handles all refund related inquiries.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund?
Here is my order number 567890 and the attached photo shows the wrong product I got instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your payment method within 3 to 5 business days.
That sounds good, thank you for resolving this quickly. I appreciate your help.
The refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited within a few business days.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund was received and that everything is now satisfactory.
Since we have not heard back, we will proceed to close this case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a short survey to gather your feedback on how we handled your refund request.
